Package distributions

Class Distribution_Normal

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributions.Distribution<Action>
      • distributions.Distribution_Normal
  • public class Distribution_Normal
extends Distribution<Action>
    Action sampling distribution implementation which is weighted according to a normal distribution. Once the mean and standard deviation of the distribution have been set in the constructor, they cannot be changed. New distributions should be created rather than editing existing ones.
    Author:
    matt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Distribution_Normal​(float mean, float stdev)
      Create a new sampling distribution which is Gaussian, with specified center and standard deviation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Action randOnDistribution​(java.util.List<Action> set)
      Get an action based on duration sampled from a normal distribution with mean and standardDeviation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Distribution_Normal

        public Distribution_Normal​(float mean,
                           float stdev)
        Create a new sampling distribution which is Gaussian, with specified center and standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        mean - Center of created distribution.
        stdev - Standard deviation of the created distribution.

    • Method Detail

      • randOnDistribution

        public Action randOnDistribution​(java.util.List<Action> set)
        Get an action based on duration sampled from a normal distribution with mean and standardDeviation. This method will choose the nearest duration action to whatever value is sampled from the continuous Gaussian distribution.
        Specified by:
        randOnDistribution in class Distribution<Action>
        Parameters:
        set - A list of actions to sample from.
        Returns:
        An action sampled from the input set according to this distribution.
